# Pearldemonium

This is a [Masyu](https://puzz.link/rules.html?mashu) with ice (the line must go straight on ice and additionally can cross itself there) with the added rule that there is exactly one pearl in the puzzle where any of the rules can be ignored.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/pearldemonium1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
